item.name: Get model for Coalesce
4.1. Get entity coalesce with attributes from self and parent level classification

exec: tests["get for coalesce successfully"] = data.has("\"id\":\"skuC0001\"") & data.has("\"NSUN KDS_SPF30 200ML\"") & data.has("\"plfurniture\"");

request.description: Get Coalesc Entity

item.name: 4.2. Get entity coalesce with attributes from self, parent level and second level classification

exec: tests["get for coalesce successfully"] = data.has("\"id\":\"skuC0001\"") & data.has("\"NSUN KDS_SPF30 200ML\"") & data.has("\"plfurniture/ptyaccentfurniture\"");

request.description: Get Coalesc Entity

item.name: 4.3. Get entity coalesce with attributes from self and 3rd level classification

exec: tests["get for coalesce successfully"] = data.has("\"id\":\"skuC0001\"") & data.has("\"NSUN KDS_SPF11 800ML\"") & data.has("\"plfurniture/ptyaccentfurniture/sptybookshelves\"");

request.description: Get Coalesc Entity

item.name: 4.4. Get entity coalesce with attributes from self, parent level and 3rd level classification

request.description: Get Coalesc Entity

item.name: 4.5. Get entity coalesce with attributes from self, parent level and overridden attributes from second level classification

exec: tests["get for coalesce successfully"] = data.has("\"id\":\"skuC0001\"") & data.has("skuquantity") & data.has("\"value\":40") & data.has("plfurniture/ptyaccentfurniture");

request.description: Get Coalesc Entity

item.name: 4.6. Get entity coalesce by appliying all types of attributescriterian for string attributes at parent level classification

exec: tests["get for coalesce successfully"] = data.has("\"id\":\"skuC0001\"") & data.has("skunumber") & data.has("skuquantity") & data.has ("\"value\":30")& data.has("plfurniture");

request.description: Get Coalesc Entity

item.name: 4.7. Get entity coalesce by appliying all types of attributescriterian for string attributes at second level classification

exec: tests["get for coalesce successfully"] = data.has("\"id\":\"skuC0001\"") & data.has("displayname") & data.has("assembledheight") & data.has ("\"value\":0.052") & data.has("plfurniture/ptyaccentfurniture");

request.description: Get Coalesc Entity

item.name: 4.8. Get entity coalesce by applying all types of attributescriterian for string attributes at second level classification, when attributes are  overridden at second level classification

exec: tests["get for coalesce successfully"] = data.has("\"id\":\"skuC0001\"") & data.has("displayname") & data.has("skunumber") & data.has("plfurniture/ptyaccentfurniture");

request.description: Get Coalesc Entity

item.name: 5. Deleting overridden attributes from second level classification

exec: tests["entity delete updated successfully"] = data.has("Entity has been submitted for update with entity Id : skuC0001. Please check back after 1 min");

request.description: Get entity coalesce with attributes from self, parent level and deleting overridden attributes from second level classification

item.name: 5.1. Get Entity - Deleting overridden attributes from second level classification

exec: tests["get entity is updated deleted"] = data.has("\"id\":\"skuC0001\"") & data.has("\"classification\":\"plfurniture/ptyaccentfurniture\"") & data.has("\"value\":\"NSUN KDS_SPF30 500ML\"");
